description: This table contains the item detail for a recommendation audit trail entry.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the recommendation record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated workflow in this recommendation record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REC_LINK_AUDIT_TRL.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple audit trail item details that are associated with the recommendation and the workflow from the REC_LINK_AUDIT_TRL table.

columns.name: AUDIT_ITEM_DETAIL
columns.description: The detail that describes the appointment or order that was linked or unlinked in the recommendation audit trail entry.
